name: matrix_sum
description: The program should compute the sum of all the elements of matrix a and store it in s.
invariants: 0 <= M && 0 <= i <= N && s = rowsSum(A,i,M) && fixVars(a,n,m,A,N,M)
0 <= i < N && 0 <= j <= M && s = rowsSum(A,i,M) + rowSum(A,i,j) && fixVars(a,n,m,A,N,M)

shorthands.name: eqMatr
shorthands.definition: (A i : 0 <= i < rows : (A j : 0 <= j < cols : m1[i][j] = m2[i][j]))

shorthands.name: rowsSum
shorthands.definition: (SUM row : 0 <= row < rows : rowSum(m, row, cols))
